features: Seamless Auto-Pairing: Our Wireless Lavalier Microphone Kit takes the frustration out of setup. It offers a hassle-free, automatic pairing process that eliminates the need for complex configurations. Simply connect the receiver, power up the transmitters, and watch them seamlessly sync in seconds, ensuring a stress-free start to your recording session.

Universal Compatibility: This microphone wireless kit with two adapters is designed to adapt effortlessly to a wide range of devices, making it incredibly versatile. This microphone for iphone, Android smartphones, and PCs is widely compatible, ensuring it suits your gear, whether you're capturing videos, conducting interviews, or recording podcasts. You'll have a dependable solution for various content creation needs.

Dual Microphones for Creative Freedom: With two lavalier microphone wireless included, this mini microphone kit offers unparalleled flexibility. You can capture audio from two different sources simultaneously or extend your recording time without the hassle of complicated setup procedures. Your creativity knows no bounds, giving you the freedom to explore new content creation possibilities.

Exceptional Noise Reduction & Mute Function: Our mini microphone for pc is equipped with advanced DSP noise cancellation technology, ensuring pristine audio quality even in noisy environments. The intuitive mute functionof this usb microphone allows you to pause audio recording with a simple click, providing precise control over your content. You can maintain seamless video recording while managing your audio effortlessly.

Stable Signal & Extended Battery Life: Powered by cutting-edge 2.4GHz wireless signal technology, our lapel microphone wireless kit guarantees stable, delay-free signal transmission, reaching up to 65 feet. The clip on microphone perfect for indoor and outdoor recording scenarios where messy cables are not an option. Quick charging ensures that the transmitter can be fully charged in just one hour, providing up to 6 hours of continuous use. By swapping transmitters, you can extend your recording time to 12 hours or more. Additionally, the receiver requires no separate charging, ensuring uninterrupted recording sessions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Appreciation for Outstanding Lavalier Microphones
reviews.reviewText: Greetings,I wanted to personally express my utmost satisfaction with the lavalier microphones I recently acquired. The seamless performance and impressive features have left me thoroughly impressed.Straight out of the box, these microphones worked like a charm, connecting instantly without any complications. This hassle-free setup process has significantly enhanced my recording experience, especially when using them with both my PC and smartphone for video recording purposes.The transmitter lived up to its advertised capabilities, working flawlessly with my Android phones and PC. This consistency has truly exceeded my expectations and has made these microphones an essential part of my recording setup.Beyond functionality, I must commend the design aesthetics of the microphones. The styling adds a touch of sophistication, making them not only a practical tool but also a visually appealing one.I wanted to take a moment to express my gratitude for delivering a product that aligns with its advertised features and, in fact, surpasses them. Your commitment to quality and user satisfaction has made a significant impact on my recording endeavors.Thank you for providing such outstanding lavalier microphones. I look forward to continued satisfaction with your products and, undoubtedly, recommending them to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up- clear sound!
reviews.reviewText: The wireless cell phone microphone exceeded my expectations! The sound quality is crystal clear, and the wireless feature adds incredible convenience. Whether for calls or recording, it's a game-changer. We use to help film content and pick up sound better on subjects we are filming. Compact design, easy to use, and reliable connectivity make it a must-have accessory for anyone looking to enhance their mobile audio experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These microphones work as described. My grandson and his friend love them. They produce clear sound with no feedback at all . I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for an outstanding product for a gift or for yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent wireless mikes!
reviews.reviewText: I have a YouTube channel called Dog Minded and I am always interested in how to get the sound better on my channel because I have a soft voice. Well! I think I found the answer with the Wireless Lavalier Microphone.It arrived so tidily packed which I loved! I got it super quickly after ordering it.The setup process was simple and the microphone was easy to use. I think for me, it is a matter of how to have the little receiver part that hangs off the phone not cumbersome when I am walking at the park with my dog recording video. I have to work on that but that is my problem, not the mikes. I do wish the receivers could be smaller or magnetically attach to the phone in some way. I have an iPhone 15 Pro.The microphone really met my expectations at a good price. I highly recommend it!
